metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.html: Before you continue you should have a basic understanding of the following:

content.text: If you want to study these subjects first, find the tutorials on our Home page .
content.html: If you want to study these subjects first, find the tutorials on our Home page.

content.text: PHP is an amazing and popular language!
content.html: PHP is an amazing and popular language!

content.text: It is powerful enough to be at the core of the biggest blogging system on the web (WordPress)! It is deep enough to run large social networks! It is also easy enough to be a beginner's first server side language!
content.html:
It is powerful enough to be at the core of the biggest blogging system on the web (WordPress)!
It is deep enough to run large social networks!
It is also easy enough to be a beginner's first server side language!

content.text: With PHP you are not limited to output HTML. You can output images or PDF files. You can also output any text, such as XHTML and XML.
content.html: With PHP you are not limited to output HTML. You can output images or PDF files. You can also output any text, such as XHTML and XML.
